history.proof: intros d0 d1 sigma H0 H1. unfold dta_correct_wrt_sign, inter in *. destruct d0 as [p0 a0]. destruct d1 as [p1 a1]. qsimpl use: inter_semantics. srun best use: preDTA_produit_correct_wrt_sign_invar.

ctx: intros d0 d1 sigma H0 H1.
exceptions.exn: In environment p0 : preDTA a0 : ad p1 : preDTA a1 : ad sigma : signature H0 : predta_correct_wrt_sign p0 sigma H1 : predta_correct_wrt_sign p1 sigma Unable to unify "(reconnait ?M1857 ?M1860 /\\ reconnait ?M1858 ?M1860 -> reconnait (inter ?M1857 ?M1858) ?M1860) /\\ (reconnait (inter ?M1857 ?M1858) ?M1860 -> reconnait ?M1857 ?M1860 /\\ reconnait ?M1858 ?M1860)" with "forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit p0 p1) a = Some s -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma".

original: intros d0 d1 sigma H0 H1. unfold dta_correct_wrt_sign, inter in *. destruct d0 as [p0 a0]. destruct d1 as [p1 a1]. simpl in *. apply inter_semantics; auto.
